website_summaries.verdict: This complete aerial yoga kit has everything from the basic swing to handled straps and a carry bag.
pros: Kit includes daisy-chain extension straps, instruction guide, carrying case, and you get a free ebook emailed to you with purchase
We love the 5-year warranty and 100% satisfaction guarantee
cons: Material not as smooth silk/silky nylon
Some handles seem to break easily, though the company quickly replaces the entire setup

customer_reviews.title: "EXTRA STRENGTH and SAFE"?  Not quite.
customer_reviews.text: Looked good, easy enough to install ... first time sitting in it heard a stretching tearing sound. It was the "Triple Stitched" seam ... I weigh 198. Not what I was expecting from the ad, "EXTRA STRENGTH and SAFE we have over exceeded any weight expectations and tripled stitched our trapeze so you will have peace of mind while stretching and going upside down " I doubt this would have failed to the point that it tore clean through, but returning and trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: T. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke very first time I used it. Took a while to hang up so I am outside of my return window. Cheap materials. **update** this is an amazing company. They saw my review and promptly sent a replacement with a handwritten note of apology. The new swing is perfect. Will sing their praises to all who will listen. This has helped me incredibly with my low back issues.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Koterwas

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time I used it! Very dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made. Handle broke the first time I used it. This product is unsafe and should be pulled from amazon. Stitching is not of good quality. The stitching near the carabiners is triple rowed with a reinforced stitch, however, stitching is only double rowed chain stitch on seams of the swing and appeared to be stretching the the first time I used it. Look elsewhere! I'm 155#s just for reference.
customer_reviews.author: NiMarie

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install and adjust. Brilliant product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install! It was easier than I thought. And can be easily moved. I’m so excited about this part... because I can stretch in front yard or back yard or in my house or at my friends house when she gets one too. The stitching is great and the color is beautiful. Everything is adjustable to your needs. And the swing part is nice and wide. Both my husband and I have used it and my teen and my little kids are curious and have sat in it with assistance. Everybody stretches!
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product even for those of us that are overweight and/or uncoordinated
customer_reviews.text: I waited a couple of months to do my review. I am really enjoying this yoga swing! It came with everything I needed right out of the box. The material is sturdy and this is a well made product. I am 5’ 8” and 200lbs., this holds me with no problems. I have had hernia surgery and I am now able to do exercises that I had been struggling to do. I am uncoordinated so it is taking me a while to get used to using something that moves with me. I have finally mastered going upside down and it gives me great relief from my lower back pain. I definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Winters

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga swing for the family
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this yoga swing! My girls, 10 & 12, use it regularly. It's great for exercise and to just hang out in and swing. I love the varied handles for pulling up or using your feet to invert. Great quality and comes with all the necessary pieces to get started. You just need ceiling hooks, a chin up bar (we used to get started), or a nice tree to hang it on. I would recommend this seller and brand. Michael reached out to make sure everything was going well. Great customer service. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Pack

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga sling!
customer_reviews.text: What a great yoga sling! Came in a cute little package and I love the colors! Perfect for me and my daughter. My daughter spends so much time upside down on our couch doing gymnastics moves. This is a great alternative for her to practice all her inversions!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: My whole family makes fun of me for having this yoga swing
customer_reviews.text: My whole family makes fun of me for having this yoga swing. I don’t care. When I hang upside down with my pelvis supported for a few minutes, my back and hip pain are so much better. My kids love to use it had a hammock swing. We have all napped in it.
customer_reviews.author: Honeyofsonny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Extreamly pleased with my purchase. I order the trapeze and it arrived in 2 days. Packaging was perfect. As soon as I got it I hung it up to be used. I have had it for a few days now and all is well. The material is very durable and very appealing. Like the texture of the fabric very smooth. It hold mine and my daughter weight. I am not light weighted person. Handle grips are made of hard plastic with nice foamy grip. It has been very fun for both my daughter and I. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jtroeger

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is worth the money! I'm learning new things from YouTube! Strong material!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Love this trapeze!!! SUPER easy installed (hung or taken down within a minute), light weight, easy to transport and easy to use (maybe depending on your own physical abilities). But bought this for Lowe back pain relief and even my yoga instructor says this works so much better than an inversion table and literally takes up no space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this swing!! It is very well made and has everything needed to adapt to the location. Can hang this up in your house, over a tree branch or to a stand. I like to use it as an exercise, but if my back is hurting i can use it to relieve pain also.
customer_reviews.author: Abianna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I received this it had 2 short handles on one side, instead of having the middle length. Also, the daisy chain it came with was a bright red, I expected it to be at least a similar color. The last disappointment was the handle, a piece of the plastic (the side of the handle) snapped off while in use. With that said, I'll be returning and search out another one.
customer_reviews.author: jessica verhoff

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy product for a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recieved this for Christmas and practically lives in it now! It's better than we imagined. Allowing a loved one to dangle from the ceiling is not for the faint of heart, but Aerial Trapeze is so sturdy and comes with attachments that allow extra grip. We are very happy with the purchase. It's an incredible price for what it offers.
customer_reviews.author: lane bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Fabric can be painful, very stiff.
customer_reviews.text: Though this product is designed pretty well and extremely sturdy, I wouldn't recommend it for anyone beginning mainly due to the fabric. It might possibly be more comfortable to someone who already has the muscle and skin tolerance. It's pretty stiff and painful to have all your weight positioned on parachute fabric that has no give one so ever. I am returning it for a arial silk yoga hammock, but I want to make it clear the product itself is well designed, made and sturdy. The fabric alone is why I wouldn't recommend this to someone unless they know 100% they have tolerance to stiff fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Wednesdaysmum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase!! Amazing quality.
customer_reviews.text: Possibly my favorite purchase ever. I will say it was a bit intimidating at first. I’ll probably buy longer and thicker daisy chains to hang it from my trees, but overall I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sigman Auto Negotiations

customer_reviews.title: I love this trapeze
customer_reviews.text: I love this trapeze. I had a lot of trouble with my neck and back. My physical therapist recommended a $800 machine for neck traction but I wanted to try this. I pair it with YouTube videos and get a great workout. It is really easy to hang up and the handles are perfect length.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Yoga Trapeze! It's super versatile and fun to use! It comes with everything you need, including a little travel bag. I hung it in my apartment and it's super easy to install and incredibly sturdy. It even makes for a fun swing if you just want to chill and relax. I'm the envy of all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Tina L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 10yr. old daughter for her birthday! She loves it and so do I! She was able to get in it with her cousins together as a hammock and hang upside down. All the girls love it and my rougher & tumble boys enjoy it too! Great purchase, so worth every $ spent. Thank you Yogatail!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AMW79

customer_reviews.title: For all ages
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought this for our 7 year old son who loves gymnastics. He uses it daily and loves it! Wonderful way for him to get energy out inside. He hangs upside down, swings, and loves to lay in it like a hammock. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE This Product
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this ship quick, but the construction and health benefits are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette K. Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: This was so much fun! I feel better than ever
customer_reviews.text: This was so much fun! I feel better than ever. This aerial swing was exactly what I was looking for. Each strap has over 5000 lb load capacity, no way to test this, but they sure feel very sturdy and safe to use(-: We have it in our patio and it looks great - beautiful color and excellent quality material ! It’s a fantastic way to unwind and build strength.Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Looking4Value

customer_reviews.title: No instructions shipped
customer_reviews.text: Update: Michael was able to email me everything I needed to help me and even helped me figure out what I would need to mount it. He made sure to help me with ever question I had and even answered some before I could ask. I’ve never experienced this kind of customer service before. FANTASTIC! And I’m able to use the swing now. So much better So, We received the package but it didn’t have the instructions or guide so now I’m left with a bunch of pieces that I can’t do anything with. Also, I didn’t know I had to purchase something separate to hang it. I guess the second thing is my fault though.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: They love to do tricks on the sling
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for kids' monkey gym. They love to do tricks on the sling. Provides lots of fun. Easy to attach with clips, provided you have hooks. Very fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy easy to use and I can take it to my local place and use my own. In my own sweat. Lol
customer_reviews.author: cassie wilson

customer_reviews.title: Safe, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love. Haven't installed the hardware yet to use it inside but hung it from a tree and was impressed by how well it's made.
customer_reviews.author: Genie L. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I have lost 30 lb
customer_reviews.text: We all lik to use it as a Hamite swing and read I have tried the positions of yoga with it And it helps with balance and other things

customer_reviews.title: Sex swing.
customer_reviews.text: Great for when no kids are in the house or not home.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this for my 6yo asd daughter for a sensory activity she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Heffner

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! We both get a workout at the same ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! We both get a workout at the same time. My wife tries new stuff and I get an ab workout from laughing so hard while watching her maneuver her body. Our two young boys love to use it and pretend to be Peter Pan! Overall, great investment!
customer_reviews.author: HANK

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, easy to hang, easy to move, easy to store!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, and easy to learn. This was my first time using a yoga trapeze. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim J.

customer_reviews.title: ... received the item and it seems to be of excellent quality. I have a bulging disc and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the item and it seems to be of excellent quality. I have a bulging disc and I hope it will help with some of the pain. I can easily get into the inversion positions. But only time will tell how effective it will be for my back pain. That being said, I have no complaints about the product itself. I'm about 160 lbs and it seems to fully support my weight with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Just go for it
customer_reviews.text: I feel so relaxed and my back pain is reducing! I highly recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Jennay

customer_reviews.title: Strong material and design.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Can hold me worth no problem and I'm 6ft 195lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice so far, I like it a lot!! It hurts a little when using it, but I imagine you get used to it after a while.
customer_reviews.author: ahk200721

customer_reviews.title: Also works as a small hammock
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to install, fantastic customer service. Bought as a gift for my fiancée and she loves it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and challenging.
customer_reviews.text: So enjoying our aerial swing hammock. It is so much fun. We have had a great laugh trying to get the hang of it but we are actually starting to get rather good.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Tucker

customer_reviews.title: I love the compact size
customer_reviews.text: I love the compact size, color and texture of it! While I haven't been able to mount/ use it yet, I highly look forward to it! #excited !

customer_reviews.title: Happy yoga swing family
customer_reviews.text: We love it! My family has all tried it! Although we all need to practice on technique, it's so much fun!

customer_reviews.title: Just not right for aerial yoga
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, but not good for aerial yoga. You need fabric that has some give or it will cut off your circulation when doing inversions.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Lea

customer_reviews.title: Little instructions or positions illustrated.
customer_reviews.text: There wasn’t much included to help show the different positions. You get the trapeze and have to figure things out on your own. Website was down when I tried to view it.
customer_reviews.author: Reiunlse3126

customer_reviews.title: All the fun
customer_reviews.text: Soft fabric, all the handles are useful and removable if needed. Fun for the whole family from kids swinging to adults stretching. We used a door frame chin up bar as the support bar to hang it from.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fun stretch
customer_reviews.text: First- my toddler loves playing in this way more than me, and I do like it a lot. I had hoped there would be slight more fabric, or the hammock would fan out more, but I'm a new user and still getting used to it. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: purchased this for my daughter with the expectations that others ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for my daughter with the expectations that others would be using it and she loves it and so do her friends.

customer_reviews.title: love the yoga trapeze
customer_reviews.text: love the yoga trapeze, it help me to stretch out my back and is an entertainment for the kids - they love to go through all the movements and or just sit in it to relax

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, if you're thinking about buying one, do it.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely versatile and easy to use. I am extremely happy we bought it.

customer_reviews.title: Recommendation for this product couldn't be better!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is amazing, colors are bright but buy TOO bright, is everything I expected and more. It's already helping me build my core muscles, and the inversion option has also helped my disc herniatins in my neck. The extension lines are sturdy and practically indestructible. Took me a few days to test/try/trust the apparatus, but now I have not m no worries about my safety. Plus I get to feel like a twelve year old for a few minutes everyday on my adult jungle gym. Love, love, love it. Thanks so much. I'll definitely be recommending to my friends and family. AND IT WAS DELIVERED EARLY, TOO. EXCEEDED ALL EXPECTATIONS. SO MUCH WIN!

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I have lived this since the day I hung it 💗 great quality for a good price. Do it

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! Tiny tear in the fabric of one of the handles but I reached out to the company and they responded within 24hrs! Offered to send out a new handle and let production know about the rip. Great yoga trapeze

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Love these but this one was missing the black hooks. I had some in the garage, but still shouldn’t have been my problem.

customer_reviews.title: works great. I use it in a door frame which ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. I use it in a door frame which is a bit tight but works. There are lots of choices out their like this and this one delivers.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and affordable for yoga and inversions
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many of these systems and this one is the easiest and most straight forward for basic antigravity fun.

customer_reviews.title: Swinging is awesome.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a way better price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a way better price. They also sent emails to make sure I was not having any issues. I am very happy with the product and the service. I found lots of tutorials on YouTube. The instructions given are very basic.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered on Friday afternoon and it arrived today, Monday! Very fast & free shipping, excellent quality of product, and I love the handwritten note included in the package. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Solid product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing I had never tried a yoga sling, and am still learning a great deal. I am very familiar with various types of outdoor gear, and am a big gear junkie especially in regards to whitewater, camping, hiking and snow sports. This sling is well made with high quality materials. The padded grips provide a sense of stability when attempting awkward/inverted positions, and I would question the integrity of the support beams in my ceiling before I'd be concerned about the super solid straps and carabiners. Great gear for an excellent bargain, and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Aerial Trapeze Yoga Swing - [UPDATED VERSION] Gym Strength Antigravity Yoga Hammock - Inversion Trapeze Sling Exercise Equipment with Two Extender Hanging Straps - Blue Swings & Beginner Instructions
feature_bullets: RELIEF from BACK PAIN in 7 minutes with a yoga inversion swing therapy. The Yogatail inversion trapeze Swing allows inversions and exercise from home or outdoors. Aerial yoga swing will provide inversion relief to your back pain and joints while strengthening your body.

SPACE SAVER avoid cludder with this all in one space saving gym equipment, allows more mobility than an inversion table and the benefits of a workout machine that packs into a pouch that is less than a 12 inch box

EXCELLENT BENEFITS – Opens up your back, hips, chest, and shoulders. Use to increase strength, improve balance, open and enhance your yoga abilities while crafting that yoga body that you want with this inversion trapeze

EXTRA STRENGTH manufacturer backed 600 lbs weight accommodating, climber-strength hanging extension straps, matching triple stitched parachute material and black iron clad carabiners.... go ahead and relax in your new hanging yoga swing.

QUALITY UPGRADES comes from experience and *Exclusive 5-Year Warranty VALID only from Yogatail and Yogatail authorized dealers... our customer service is here for you 100% of the time. Your SATISFACTION GUARANTEED or your money back
